recipesJson.name: Spoiled Milk blind remix
recipesJson.author: Warbstar17
recipesJson.description: Have you ever looked at the art work on a commercial bottle of e-liquid and been inspired, when I saw the brilliant label on strange fruits "Spoiled Milk"  I wanted that e-liquid, but I wasn't going to pay for it, I read the profile, a lime citrus milkshake and I had a bash at it a few versions down the line and this recipe was born and so I proudly present "Spoiled Milk blind remix" .
